title: Telesat taps Aalyria to provide network orchestration
summary: Telesat selected Aalyria Technologies to orchestrate communications for its Lightspeed low-Earth orbit broadband network.

title: SpaceX launches back-to-back Falcon 9 missions over the weekend
summary: SpaceX successfully launched the Transporter 9 mission from California and a pair of O3b mPower communications satellites from Florida over the weekend...

title: Space Companies Join Movement to Stop Debris-Producing ASAT Tests
summary: Today the Secure World Foundation announced that 26 space companies from 10 countries have signed a statement supporting international efforts to stop direct-ascent antisatellite tests that create space debris that […]

title: ESA Signs Starlab Commercial Space Station Agreement With Airbus and Voyager Space
summary: The European Space Agency has inked a memorandum of understanding with Airbus and Voyager Space to explore the potential of a Starlab commercial space station as a successor to the ISS.

title: Spire launches constellation management platform
summary: Spire Global, a space-based data and services firm, has launched a web-based app designed to simplify satellite constellation operations for its customers.
